catalog_script_client.name: Show/hide fields - onLoad

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5eba274d1b0cc1905b1b411acd4bcb2a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OLD Technical Services">3a6c66681b0c01905b1b411acd4bcb88</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Show/hide fields - onLoad</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {

	g_form.setVisible('requested_for', false);
	g_form.setVisible('contact', false);
	g_form.setVisible('account', false);

	g_form.setMandatory('failure_description', true);
	g_form.setVisible('serial_number', true);


	g_form.setVisible('location', false);
	g_form.setVisible('tools_on_site', false);
	g_form.setVisible('software', false);
	g_form.setVisible('software_version', false);
	g_form.setVisible('prerequisit_version', false);
	g_form.setVisible('filter_resset_date', false);
	g_form.setVisible('filter_activity', false);
	g_form.setVisible('engine_model', false);
	g_form.setVisible('engine_serial_number', false);
	// g_form.setVisible('failure_code', false);
	//g_form.setVisible('failure_description', false);
	g_form.setVisible('safety_related_issue', false);
	g_form.setVisible('failure_rate', false);
	g_form.setVisible('failure_cost', false);
	g_form.setVisible('escalation_level', false);
	g_form.setVisible('d_identification', false);
	g_form.setVisible('d_link_url', false);
	g_form.setVisible('service_information_link', false);
	g_form.setVisible('responsibility_reason_code', false);
	g_form.setVisible('attachments_lidia', false);
	g_form.setVisible('attachments_sculi', false);
	g_form.setVisible('attachments_dpf', false);
	g_form.setReadOnly('st_operating_hours', true);

	if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('snc_internal', true)) {
		g_form.setVisible('requested_for', true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('requested_for', true);
		g_form.setVisible('account', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('account', true);
		g_form.clearValue('contact');

	} else if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('snc_external', true)) {
		if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('sn_customerservice.customer_admin', true)) {
			g_form.setVisible('contact', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('contact', true);
			g_form.setVisible('requested_for', false);
			g_form.clearValue('requested_for');
			g_form.setVisible('account', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('account', true);
		} else if (g_user.hasRoleExactly('sn_customerservice.customer', true)) {
			g_form.setVisible('account', false);
			g_form.setVisible('requested_for', false);
			g_form.clearValue('requested_for');
		}
	}




}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>anis.bekdash@doitwise.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-24 15:25:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5eba274d1b0cc1905b1b411acd4bcb2a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>52</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show/hide fields - onLoad</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5eba274d1b0cc1905b1b411acd4bcb2a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kristian.teodorov@doitwise.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-02 07:57:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
